<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 20"
    pfs=""
>
[The Midwife](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2511)
</title>

<spoilers>May contain spoilers from Stolen Fate</spoilers>

<traits>
<trait label="Unique" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=161" />
<trait label="Artifact" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=253" />
<trait label="Invested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=98" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Necromancy" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=117" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #191: The Destiny War](/Sources.aspx?ID=199) pg. 76</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** carried

</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

_The Midwife_ represents the arrival of new life or new information, particularly via the aid of another. As long as you have _The Midwife_ invested, it grants a +2 item bonus to [Medicine](/Skills.aspx?ID=9) checks. This increases to a +3 bonus if you are at least 17th level.

<document level="2" id="action-2057" />

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: The Midwife
